subtitle: I've had the opportunity to immerse myself in the dynamic world of Shopify development. Working extensively with the Shopify ecosystem, I became proficient in customizing themes, and extending functionalities through Shopify's Liquid templating language. I successfully integrated third-party apps, optimized product listings for a seamless shopping experience, and ensured responsive designs for a variety of devices. My experience also involved configuring and enhancing Shopify Plus features, meeting the unique needs of high-scale e-commerce businesses. Through this journey, I honed my skills in leveraging Shopify's APIs for seamless integrations and developing robust e-commerce solutions.

experience.title: My experience
experience.theme_customisation: High quality theme customisation with a mobile-first approach
experience.custom_sections: Restyling and creating custom theme sections
experience.quantity_controls: Enhanced product quantity controls with maximum quantity restrictions across a range of product
experience.migration: Migration to shopify theme version 2 and checkout version 2

google_tag_manager.title: Google Tag Manager integration
google_tag_manager.description: Detailed analytics are important for an ecommerce website. I implemented a datalayer of relevant ecommerce events and set up the corresponding tags, triggers and variables on Google Tag Manager.

algolia.title: Algolia integration
algolia.description: Algolia is an alternative to Shopify's out-of-the-box search functionality. It provides a more robust search and discovery experience. I have imtegrated this functionality and styling into multiple Shopify projects.

performance.title: Performance and SEO
performance.description: With large, complex web applications performance is always an important consideration. As a developer, I use Google Lighthouse to monitor and improve the performance, accessibility and SEO of my projects. And of course, these all relate to and affect eachother.
